title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Gamification-Based Language Learning Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and basic gamification concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-based workshop for graduate students to strengthen gamification design skills in language learning contexts, emphasizing role allocation and team-based activities.

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning scenarios utilizing game mechanics (e.g., experience points, achievements, leaderboards).
Learners can develop gamification activity drafts within 3 hours by applying rapid prototyping techniques.
Learners can improve gamification design proposals based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
